de: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
ru: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
en: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
it: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
fr: Un moment  "despaysans", entre brebis et chiens de bergers, les mardis et jeudis à 17h30 : rencontrez un couple de paysans passionnés, assistez à la traite des brebis et à la démonstration de chiens de troupeau, dégustez les produits bio de la ferme.
nl: Een verandering van omgeving, tussen schapen en herdershonden, op dinsdag en donderdag om 17.30 uur: ontmoet een paar gepassioneerde boeren, bekijk het melken van de schapen en de demonstratie van de herdershonden, proef de biologische producten van de boerderij.
zh: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
es: A change of scenery, between sheep and sheepdogs, on Tuesdays and Thursdays at 5:30 pm: meet a couple of passionate farmers, watch the milking of the sheep and the demonstration of herding dogs, taste the farm's organic products.
